word: 4 (see EGW on Genesis 3:24). Deviation More Grievous Than Death.-- [Matthew 4:4 quoted.] He told Satan that in order to prolong life, obedience to God's requirements was more essential than temporal food. To pursue a course of deviation from the purposes of God, in the smallest degree, would be more grievous than hunger or death (Redemption: or The First Advent of Christ, p. 48).
